str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To tell (say) beforehand, forewarn, declare, tell plainly. From pro and lego; to say beforehand, i.e. Predict, forewarn.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

word: is preaching to you a gospel
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From para and lambano; to receive near, i.e. Associate with oneself; by analogy, to assume an office; figuratively, to learn.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A votive offering, a thing devoted to God; a curse, the thing cursed. From anatithemai; a ban or excommunicated.
